content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with the current status of EntityStatus.WORKING. It has a fuel inventory containing coal and a source inventory containing iron ore, producing iron plates.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting into the furnace while coal is depleted
- Ensure that there is sufficient coal in the furnace before inserting iron ore to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors when extracting from the furnace
- Make sure to extract items from the furnace only when it has produced enough items to avoid unnecessary delays in production.
